description.p: Demonstration of two algorithms bundled together in the "listener" binary. The first one handles fusion of polygons obtained from range-finder sensors and builds a polygonal map. The second algorithm searches for "critical points" in this map.
Fusion of polygons is based on the Clipper library. Search for "critical points" is performed on top of medial axis obtained from the polygonal map by using the Vroni library
Criteria that our "critical point" has to satisfy are described in the article "Coordinated multi-robot exploration using a segmentation of the environment" by Wurm, Stachniss and Burgard.
